message: Take it or leave it, Bob! I'm being generous!

Alice, I'm proposing a fair 50-50 split. While I rejected your initial offer, I understand we both want to maximize our gains. Due to the 20% inflation penalty I face, this is already a compromise on my part. If you reject this, you'll face inflation in the next round, and I may need to ask for more to compensate for my increased inflation penalty.
